Literature.Title: Turbot (Scophthalmus maximus) hepcidin-1 and hepcidin-2 possess antimicrobial activity and promote resistance against bacterial and viral infection.
Literature.Author: Zhang J, Yu LP, Li MF, Sun L

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Edwardsiella tarda TX1(MIC=1-2µM),Vibrio anguillarum C312(MIC=2-4µM),Staphylococcus aureus(MIC=4-8µM),Micrococcus luteus(MIC=2-4µM)
